Fig. 2. Side-Effects of amiodarone.
1.4. Drug interactions
Amiodarone has a high interaction potential with co-administered drugs. Because of its long half-life, these effects are expected to persist for weeks to months after discontinuation of Amiodarone  (Table 2).
Table 2. Drug interacting with amiodarone.
| Drug Class | Example | Effect: |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Anticoagulants  | Warfarin | Concurrent use may result in increased INR and risk of bleeding. |
| Anti-hypertensives  | Irbesartan, losartan | Concurrent use may result in increased plasma levels of anti-hypertensives. |
